content: a sweet design that is charming on-trend and fun and quick to make perfect as a great stash-buster project for recovering lost crojo and for those thoughtful last-minute gifts approximately 10g/3 5oz of 8ply/dk/cat 3 yarn required per coaster many thanks to the following testers for testing this coaster design jennifer snedden @keelawee on ig and keelawee on ravelry jesse st clair smith @anchored makers on ig anchored makers st clair creations on fb anchoredmakers on ravelry lucy thompson @maialaparklodge on ig and fb
